title: GET_VEHICLE_PED_IS_IN
content:
0x9A9112A0FE9A47130xAFE92319// GetVehiclePedIsIn
Vehicle GET_VEHICLE_PED_IS_IN(Ped ped, BOOL lastVehicle);Parameters:ped: The target pedlastVehicle: A boolean value where false represents the current vehicle the Ped is in, and true represents the last vehicle the Ped was in.Returns: The vehicle id. Returns 0 if the ped is/was not in a vehicle.Retrieves the vehicle the specified ped is currently in, or the last vehicle they were in.Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#-- This example gets the vehicle the player is currently in and print the vehicle id.

-- Retrieve the LocalPlayer.
local playerPed = PlayerPedId()

-- Retrieve the vehicle the player is currently in. 
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(playerPed, false)

-- Check if the vehicle exists in the game world.
if not DoesEntityExist(vehicle) then 
    -- If the vehicle does not exist, end the execution of the code here.
    return 
end

-- Print the vehicle id
print("Vehicle ID: " .. vehicle)
codeBlocks:
// GetVehiclePedIsIn
Vehicle GET_VEHICLE_PED_IS_IN(Ped ped, BOOL lastVehicle);

-- This example gets the vehicle the player is currently in and print the vehicle id.

-- Retrieve the LocalPlayer.
local playerPed = PlayerPedId()

-- Retrieve the vehicle the player is currently in. 
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(playerPed, false)

-- Check if the vehicle exists in the game world.
if not DoesEntityExist(vehicle) then 
    -- If the vehicle does not exist, end the execution of the code here.
    return 
end

-- Print the vehicle id
